description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Greetings!  You are a solitary space adventurer on the mission of all missions! Unfortunately, your super awesome spacecraft has suffered near fatal damage and you must make an emergency landing for parts. Luckily for you, you have landed on a planet full of spare parts and scrap metal! The down side? They fight back!  Prepare yourself for battle and remember your space cadet training!
description.short: Greetings!  You are a solitary space adventurer on the mission of all missions! Unfortunately, your super awesome spacecraft has suffered near fatal damage and you must make an emergency landing for parts. Luckily for you, you have landed on a planet full of spare parts and scrap metal! The down side? They fight back!  Prepare yourself for battle and remember your space cadet training!
